lexUnit.name: hide.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: put or keep out of sight.

sentence.text: Rozanov removed his parka then hid his face behind the Guardian .
They hid the grave so that we could n't give the bodies a proper burial .
But their ` disarmament policy " mainly amounted to asking the warlords to hide their battlewagons and anti-aircraft guns in the bush .
It had been Mme Guérigny 's and Montaine 's intimacy with the creatures of the forest that had given them the idea of hiding their deserter in the cave .
Adam grabbed Billie and hid her behind the Audi , glad that he 'd chosen a four-wheel-drive Quattro .
A commuter train , a stop at each station , all seats taken by the grey-suited men who hid from each other behind their newspapers and the film of cigarette and pipe smoke .
My mother would hide his food from us at the bottom of one of the holes in the oven .
Shy and quiet , he hid his face behind his hands and laughed .
He could hide behind the door and club them down one by one when they came in .
Before the children arrive , hide various items around the room and , if it 's a nice day , around the garden .
` Well , they have to hide the Cruise missiles somewhere , " I said , zipping up my fleece-lined leather jacket against the rain which had started coming down in ominous big spits .
I do n't know … it sort of hardens , like a shell or something and you can hide inside it and nobody can get at you .
The woman who was supposed to be hunting him seemed all the more dangerous because her face had been hidden in the photograph .
He did n't put the key in his pocket , but hid it in the plant pot next to the door .
He hid nothing from me .
When he saw his mother , he rushed to her and hid behind her .
She hid her face from him .
These laughing men were not laughing any more ; dreadful shameful thoughts were hidden behind their eyes , and she was far from help .
They had wanted no part of the terror and the bloodshed , and they had hidden in the mountains and the caves and the remote Northern Isles .
She was scared of what might be hiding in the shadows but she was terrified of her subconscious .
